name: Paywerk Payments
author: Paywerk

sections.description:
Boost your e-shop’s sales in 7 seconds with Paywerk.

Paywerk offers cross-border and domestic Pay Now and in certain countries Buy Now Pay Later payments. Payments are based on debit or credit card. Any EU e-shop can offer Pay Now payments to any EU shopper but also for domestic shoppers. Shoppers from Poland and Estonia can pay later in 30 days or split the payment in 3. Order full amount will be paid to merchant after order fulfilment. Overview of the transactions can be found in our Merchant Portal.

Merchant doesn’t have to wait for customer to pay – we take care of it together with financiers in each market. Many shoppers with different characteristics will get financing immediately. The whole process will take only about 7 seconds longer than average card payment.

Shopper’s check-out experience is very similar to card payment experience. No complicated forms to fill or account needed with Paywerk. Shopper fills one or two extra data fields (usually personal code or birth date, depending on market) and gets approval in few seconds.

More information about our solutions can be found on our website paywerk.co.
sections.installation:
For the latest information and step-by-step guidelines visit our Integration Portal.

In order to use Paywerk Payments plugin, you need to have a Merchant account at Paywerk. Go to Merchant Portal, sign up and get access to Merchant Portal. You don’t need to get fully approved by Paywerk to try the Sandbox mode.

The only thing you need for configuration is API key. You can generate an API key through Merchant Portal’s menu “API keys”.

  1. Find the plugin through WordPress’s menu Plugins, use search keyword “Paywerk”.
  2. Go to WooCommerce -> Settings -> Payments -> Paywerk Payments.
  3. Add API key that was shown in Merchant Portal.
  4. Choose “Sandbox” mode if you want to try it out. Leave the checkbox unchecked to use the production mode.
  5. Save changes.
  6. Make sure the plugin and payment method are both activated.

Integration Portal

short_description: Extends WooCommerce by adding payment options through Paywerk.
